item.title: Keris add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Keris add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Keris add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Keris add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Stop worrying about the world ending today. It's already tomorrow in Australia." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Keris add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description:
"When it's over, I want to say: all my life I was a bride married to amazement. I was the bridegroom, taking the world into my arms.
When it is over, I don't want to wonder if I have made of my life something particular, and real. I don't want to find myself sighing and frightened, or full of argument.
I don't want to end up simply having visited this world." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Keris add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Keris add a quote by Diane Von Furstenberg
item.description: "I always knew the woman I wanted to be." -- Diane Von Furstenberg

item.title: Keris add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "When you slip on a banana peel, people laugh at you. But when you tell people you slipped on a banana peel, it's your laugh." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Keris add a quote by Brené Brown
item.description: "Don't try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer." -- Brené Brown

item.title: Keris add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "We've begun to raise daughters more like sons... but few have the courage to raise our sons more like our daughters." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Keris add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Oh, how I regret not having worn a bikini for the entire year I was twenty-six. If anyone young is reading this, go, right this minute, put on a bikini, and don't take it off until you're thirty-four." -- Nora Ephron
